name: Spring (LemonCasino)
description: This game is a puzzle maze runner. Where the player is a flower and the main objective for the player is to find their sibling flowers scattered around the maze. Beware of the wolf who roam around the maze!! Sacrifice the sheep you find in the maze with your great sheep herding skills to wolves and make your way out of the maze with all your siblings. BE SAFE! GOODLUCK!
